attributes.action: We demand a full independent inquiry into the Pakistani rape gangs
attributes.additional_details: To bring the truth about paedophiles in the uk
attributes.background: Have a full independent inquiry no stones unturned

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
